title: [The Little convict : publicity kit]
brief_description: Publicity kit for the production The Little convict (1979), including 3 B&W Stills (Large), 1 B&W Still (Small), 1 Colour Still (Small), 3 Promo Flyers, 2 Colour Transparencies (Large)
